phases.objective: Reconnaissance and OSINT scraping across target regions. Shade and Ghost to initiate dark net mapping.
Cyber intrusion into regional infrastructure. Ghost to compromise power relays, Architect to model cascade effects.
Deploy narrative influence via coordinated media blitz. Ember crafts psyops payload, Oracle calculates sentiment response.
Stage simulated economic instability. Commander runs logistics redirection. Architect disrupts key pipelines.
Final destabilization push. Shade infiltrates governance structures. Commander prepares fallback protocols.
